services.name: VIP Pass Package
services.description: Enjoy the ultimate gaming convention experience with our VIP Pass Package. Includes priority access, exclusive meet and greets, and premium swag.

services.name: Panel and Workshop Access
services.description: Gain access to all panels, workshops, and educational sessions at the convention. Learn from industry experts and level up your gaming skills.

services.name: Cosplay Contest Entry
services.description: Showcase your cosplay talent and compete for fantastic prizes in our cosplay contest. Show off your creativity and win big!

services.name: Gaming Tournament Registration
services.description: Compete in thrilling gaming tournaments across various titles. Register for your favorite games and compete for glory and prizes.

services.name: Indie Game Showcase Booth
services.description: Indie game developers, reserve a booth to showcase your games to a passionate gaming audience. Get noticed and grow your fanbase.

services.name: Merchandise Expo Pass
services.description: Access our merchandise expo featuring the latest gaming gear, collectibles, and exclusive items. Shop for gaming goodies!
